00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_UNWRAP_REFERENCE_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_UNWRAP_REFERENCE_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/mpl/assert.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/mpl/eval_if.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/mpl/identity.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_traits.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/type_traits/is_reference.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/type_traits/add_reference.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/type_traits/remove_reference.hpp>
00019 #include <boost/range/reference.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/framework.hpp>
00021 
00022 // Note : In Boost.Assign.v2, this is deprecated but it could be used 
00023 // elsewhere.
00024 
00025 namespace boost{
00026 namespace assign{ 
00027 namespace v2{
00028 namespace ref{
00029 namespace unwrap_aux{
00030 
00031     // U                                        Result
00032     // ref::wrapper<Tag,T>      T&
00033     // ref::wrapper<Tag,T>&     T&
00034     // T&                                       T&
00035     template<typename U,typename T = typename boost::remove_reference<U>::type>
00036     struct reference : boost::mpl::eval_if<
00037         boost::is_reference_wrapper<T>,
00038         boost::add_reference<
00039            typename boost::unwrap_reference<T>::type
00040         >,
00041         boost::mpl::identity<U>
00042     >{
00043         static void test()
00044         {
00045             BOOST_MPL_ASSERT_NOT(( boost::is_reference<T> ));
00046         };
00047     };
00048 
00049 }// unwrap_aux
00050 }// ref
00051 }// v2
00052 }// assign
00053 }// boost
00054 
00055 #endif
